text: It was a shocking ending to an uneven season that left fans utterly gagged, and pulled back the curtain on the facade of reality show realness. It ’ s the greatest upset in “ Drag Race ” herstory, but producers ’ tricks are starting to wear thin on a dedicated fanbase who have been jerked around one too many times. On Thursday night ’ s season finale of “ RuPaul ’ s Drag Race All Stars ” Season 3, the clear frontrunner — one Miss Shangela “ Hallelu ” Laquifa Wadley — was shut out from even competing in the final lip sync. Perhaps the most chilling part of the whole kerfuffle is that the decision was made by her fellow queens. ( The episode ’ s title : “ A Jury of Their Queers ” )
